    • Constructor Detail

      • IRBenchmark

        public IRBenchmark​(Model model,
                   java.lang.String fileDocumentsPaths,
                   java.lang.String queryFile,
                   java.lang.String docExpected)
        Parameters:
        model - model on which execute benchmark
        fileDocumentsPaths - in this file, every line is a path of a document on which execute query
        queryFile - this is lisa.que file
        docExpected - in this file, for every query, there is a list of relevant documents for it

    • Method Detail

      • executeBenchmark

        public void executeBenchmark​()
        This method performs the LISA benchmark. Documents are added in the index. Array with expected documents is created. (Documents that should be retrieved) Array with retrieved documents is created. (Documents that are retrieved) Array with intersection between expected and retrieved documents is created. (For calculating precision and recall)

      • readQueries

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readQueries​()
        This method read query from lisa.que Queries are split with '#', so each query ends up with that terminator.
        Returns:
        list of queries

      • getRecall

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getRecall​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String>> intersect,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String>> expectedDocuments)
        Calculate recall
        Parameters:
        intersect - intersection beetwen expected and retrived documents
        expectedDocuments - expected documents
        Returns:
        list of recall for every query
